LanguageData.LetterDragonsPasses: A wandering {DRAGON} has appeared on your doorstep, majestic and strong. You could attempt to tame it but beware though, they may attack even those who offer gifts. Or you could hunt it for its valuable horns and leather which are powerful and rare. It will leave in a couple of days.

You could attempt to tame it but beware though, they may attack even those who offer gifts. Or you could hunt it for its valuable horns and leather which are powerful and rare.
